backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing product and cart management with blob storage mixin, providing functions to add/get products, and manage shopping cart items for users.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented holographic gradient effects across cart items, homepage feature cards, quantity controls, and checkout total section with high confidence test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of all frontend files describing components, pages, hooks, and configuration for the TS Gabrielle fashion e-commerce application with holographic design effects.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS styles defining OKLCH color system variables for light/dark themes and base styling for background, foreground, and border colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with page title "TS Gabrielle Fashion" and root div for React application mounting.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React application component configuring TanStack Router with routes for home, products, product detail, and cart pages wrapped in Layout component.
frontend/src/components/CartItem.tsx: Cart item component displaying product image, details, quantity controls with holographic button effects, and remove functionality with animated iridescent borders.
frontend/src/components/HeroCarousel.tsx: Fullscreen auto-playing carousel component with three hero slides featuring navigation arrows, dot indicators, and gradient overlays with bold vanguardist messaging.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Main layout component with sticky header featuring TS Gabrielle logo, MegaMenu navigation, holographic-bordered cart icon with badge, mobile menu, and footer.
frontend/src/components/MegaMenu.tsx: A navigation mega menu component with hover-triggered dropdown panels for 'Home' and 'Shop' links, featuring holographic border effects and detailed subcategory navigation.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: A clickable product card component that displays product image, name, and price with hover effects and navigates to the product detail page on click.
frontend/src/components/ProductGallery.t: An image gallery component for product pages that displays a main image with thumbnail navigation for multiple product images.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React Query hook that manages the backend actor instance, creating authenticated or anonymous actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries on actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: A hook providing cart functionality (get, add, update, remove) using React Query mutations and a localStorage-based user ID for anonymous cart management.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: A React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useMegaMenu.ts: A hook managing mega menu state with delayed panel closing on mouse leave using timeouts to prevent flickering during navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: React Query hooks for fetching all products or a single product by ID from the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind configuration, CSS custom properties for light/dark themes using OKLCH color space, and holographic animation effects for borders and badges.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and renders the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Cart.tsx: Shopping cart page component that displays cart items with product details, allows quantity updates and item removal, calculates total price, and shows an empty state with a call-to-action when the cart is empty.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Homepage component featuring a hero carousel, brand messaging about empowering transwomen fashion, a call-to-action button to explore products, and three feature cards highlighting vanguardist design, artistic expression, and inclusive fashion.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetail.tsx: Product detail page that displays a product gallery, full product information, price, description, and interactive controls for selecting size, color, and quantity before adding items to the cart.
frontend/src/pages/ProductListing.tsx: Product listing page that displays all available products in a responsive grid layout with loading skeletons, error handling, and an empty state message when no products are available.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, container settings, custom animations, border radius variables, and typography/container query plugins.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting the e-commerce platform for transwomen fashion with brand color #a932bd, listing implemented features including homepage carousel, product pages, cart functionality, and TS Gabrielle branding with holographic effects.
